body:
Hello, I'm a player who enjoys a lot of action and strategy in games, and Avicus is a perfect place for me.
I like reading books and comics, I like Marvel and DC.
I like watching T.V. shows such as, The Flash, Gotham, Agents of Shield, Arrow and many more.
I like playing with Legos, one of the most amazing things in the world :)
I hope to become a Graphic art artists that works with making cartoons and movies.
I like making YouTube videos when I have time for fun.
Thank you for using your time to read this :-)

replies.body:
+1
And welcome (or welcome back) to the Avicus forums!

Here you will find helpful and kind people, but beware there are trolls (rarely) XD. Ask the staff members for help if needed and you should have a great time! Also, make sure you see this page http://avicus.net/rules.

Other then that, have fun and feel welcomed to the Avicus community :D
